metadata.description: Who is Infantry? What is his agenda? Is he a new hero of the people... or merely a pawn in a larger game? The hordes of NEMESIS are America's greatest enemy, attacking it from within at its highest levels of power. What does this have to do with a mysterious super-agent, the lone survivor of a doomed experiment in human peformance enhancement? Written by Joe Casey (Wildcats, Adventures of Superman, Uncanny X-Men) and drawn by star-in-the making Clement Sauve (Wetworks), Infantry is a political thriller wrapped in an over-the-top action tale.
metadata.name: Infantry
